channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Disney cruise ship to set sail with the longest roller coaster at sea and other ‘firsts’
item.description: Love Disney and thrill rides? Disney Adventure might be the cruise ship for you. Scheduled to set sail in December 2025 from a new-to-Disney port in S...

item.title: Make your next flight fly by with Audible

item.title: How do travel credit cards work?
item.description: Editor’s note: This is a recurring post, regularly updated with new information and offers. If you’re unfamiliar with the world of credit card rewards...
